Question.Subject: Websites where sex stories, or "lemons" are ok?
Question.Content: I have a Quizilla.com account (TonksMoony2) and I started writing lemon stories and they got deleted because they changed the rules. Do any of you know of any websites where "lemon" stories are ok?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You can try www.booksie.com
Chapter 38 of Our Fake Relationship was deleted on quizilla and was allowed on that website. So I guess it is okay for that kind of story. I'm not sure thought.
Hoped I helped you! Eternal Snow
